MoneyOwl Investments Robo-Advisors Promo Codes Asked by Adrian WongAsked on 04 Jun 2019I am new to Money Owl and would want to register myself to start investing, but before I do so, wanted to know if anyone out here has a Promo Code/Referral Code that I can use?

Thanks!I am new to Money Owl and would want to register myself to start investing, but before I do so, wanted to know if anyone out here has a Promo Code/Referral Code that I can use?Thanks!2 answersAnswerBump0

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 04 Jun 2019I was browsing around and saw that Smartly had a limited time offer on management fees as well!0 comments1

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 04 Jun 2019There is no referral promo currently but there is a code EVNT25Invest by 30th June and you pay 0.5% advisory fee instead of 0.65%. Other fees no discount.0 comments1
